about_the_game:
The original soundtrack to INFERNAX, in all its retro chiptune glory! Bathe *musically* in the blood of your enemies, all in the name of JUSTICE.

  • Includes 47 tracks composed by Jason Létourneau, Jules 'FamilyJules' Conroy and Olivier Couillard. THAT'S A LOT OF TRACKS!
  • MP3 AND FLAC files, in case you're into that kinda thing.
  • Two (2) ((dos)) bonus tracks that are not even in the game. What more could you ask for??
  • By purchasing and downloading these, you hereby consent to these living rent free in your head for a bit. You have been warned!
detailed_description:
The original soundtrack to INFERNAX, in all its retro chiptune glory! Bathe *musically* in the blood of your enemies, all in the name of JUSTICE.

  • Includes 47 tracks composed by Jason Létourneau, Jules 'FamilyJules' Conroy and Olivier Couillard. THAT'S A LOT OF TRACKS!
  • MP3 AND FLAC files, in case you're into that kinda thing.
  • Two (2) ((dos)) bonus tracks that are not even in the game. What more could you ask for??
  • By purchasing and downloading these, you hereby consent to these living rent free in your head for a bit. You have been warned!
